name: Statue (Neomagic)
description:
While living an ordinary life, we lie on a sofa to relax in the office. When we wake up, nothing is normal, everyone I know, the whole environment has changed. Will we be able to survive in this different dimension? Developers 
  • Ali Emre ÇELİK
  • Kaan Erk TORAMAN
Controls
  • Walking => W,A,S,D
  • jump => space
  • Crouch => ctrl
  • Zoom => mb2
  • interact => mb1
  • Close tab => Q
Musics
  • Necromancy : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QwBqUfCInTI&t=43s
  • Gloomy buildings : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yFBBy53QILo&t=129s
